Get Default Parameter Code for Corrected QT

Source: R/derive_adeg_params.R
default_qtc_paramcd.Rd

Get Default Parameter Code for Corrected QT

Usage

default_qtc_paramcd(method)

Arguments

method

Method used to QT correction

Permitted Values: "Bazett", "Fridericia", "Sagie"

Value

"QTCBR" if method is "Bazett", "QTCFR" if it's "Fridericia" or "QTLCR" if it's "Sagie". An error otherwise.

See also

BDS-Findings Functions for adding Parameters/Records: derive_extreme_records(), derive_param_bmi(), derive_param_bsa(), derive_param_computed(), derive_param_doseint(), derive_param_exist_flag(), derive_param_exposure(), derive_param_first_event(), derive_param_framingham(), derive_param_map(), derive_param_qtc(), derive_param_rr(), derive_param_wbc_abs(), derive_summary_records()

Author

Thomas Neitmann

Examples

default_qtc_paramcd("Sagie")
#> <list_of<quosure>>
#> 
#> $PARAMCD
#> <quosure>
#> expr: ^"QTLCR"
#> env:  empty
#>
